sourcesContent:
import { useFormik } from 'formik';
import FormStyle from "./UI/FormStyle"
import Button from "./UI/Button"
import Input from "./UI/Input"

import styled from '@emotion/styled';

const messageStyle = {
    height: "20vh",
    marginBottom: "10px",
    padding: "5px",
    width: "100%",
    wordBreak: "break-word",
    fontFamily: "San Francisco",
    fontSize: "14px",
}

const MessageForm = () => {
    return (
        <FormStyle>
            <label for="name">Name:</label>
            <Input type="text" name="name" placeholder="Ana, Pedro, Juan..." />

            <label for="city">Your city:</label>
            <Input type="text" name="city" placeholder="Montevideo, Dublin..." />
            <label for="message">Your message:</label>
            <textarea style={messageStyle} type="text" name="message" placeholder="AndrÃ©s, sos un capo..." />
            <Button type="Submit">Submit</Button>
        </FormStyle>
    )
}

export default MessageForm
